section.title: Configuring the Switch Year Behavior on the Application Server

description.p: By default, all two digit years are interpted as occuring in the 2000s. You can change this behavior on the Web Application Server in the Web Project Properties:
From the Web Projects Control Panel, open the Project Properties.
Set the switch year to the desired default and save your changes. Leave the *[ui:Switch year]* blank in the Project Properties to interpret all two digit years as occuring in the 2000s.
